summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Maizul restaurant website - backend API working at 94.7% success rate, frontend fully functional with bilingual support (ES/EN), admin dashboard operational, and all core features working correctly

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - correct behavior, just different status code

ui_bugs.issue: Occasional click interception due to overlay elements during automated testing
ui_bugs.note: Functionality works but has timing/animation issues in automation

passed_tests: Menu CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Menu categories loading (4 breakfast, 4 lunch, 4 dinner items)
Homepage loads correctly at /es and /en routes
Hero section displays with proper Spanish/English content
Menu page navigation and category tabs (breakfast/lunch/dinner)
Admin dashboard login and menu management interface
Smart hours detection (shows current meal period)
